nodes.text: Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Graphics

Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Graphics is an infographic reference book based on the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens. It was originally published by Hachette Livre in 2016, and later by Egmont UK Ltd in the United Kingdom on May 4, 2017.
How big is the new TIE Fighter? How has the First Order Stormtrooper evolved? What proportion of new characters are droids? From Jakku to Takodana, what planets do the heroes visit?
Unravel the secrets of the Star Wars universe with this wonderfully illustrated infographic book.
Includes all the new ships, characters, locations and movie moments from The Force Awakens.
